Literature.Title: A broad-spectrum bactericidal lipopeptide with anti-biofilm properties.
Literature.Author: Meir O, Zaknoon F, Cogan U, Mor A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Streptococcus agalactiae ATCC 13813(MIC=0.78-3.12µM),Streptococcus agalactiae ATCC 27956(MIC=0.78-3.12µM),Streptococcus equinus ATCC 9809(MIC=0.78-3.12µM),Streptococcus mutans ATCC 35668(MIC=0.78-3.12µM),Streptococcus mutans UA159(MIC=0.78-3.12µM),Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 49619(MIC=0.78-3.12µM),Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 6303(MIC=0.78-3.12µM),Streptococcus pyogenes ATCC 19615(MIC=0.78-3.12µM),Streptococcus sobrinus ATCC 27352(MIC=0.78-3.12µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=1.56-3.12µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=1.56-3.12µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=1.56-3.12µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-1720(MIC=1.56-3.12µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=1.56-3.12µM),Staphylococcus xylosus ATCC 29971(MIC=1.56-3.12µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=3.12-6.25µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 35667(MIC=3.12-6.25µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 33677(MIC=6.25µM),Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778(MIC=6.25µM),Listeria grayi ATCC 19120(MIC=3.12µM),Listeria innocua ATCC 33090(MIC=3.12µg/ml),Listeria ivanovii ATCC 19119(MIC=3.12µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19115(MIC=3.12µM),Listeria seeligeri ATCC 35967(MIC=3.12µM),Listeria welshimeri ATCC 35897(MIC=3.12µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=3.12-6.25µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 43894(MIC=3.12-6.25µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=6.25-12.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=6.25-12.5µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=3.12->25µM),Acinetobacter calcoaceticus ATCC 31299(MIC=3.12->25µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=3.12µM),Fusobacterium nucleatum ATCC 23726(MIC=6.25µM),Porphyromonas gingivalis ATCC 53977(MIC=3.12µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=3.12-12.5µg/ml)
